attributes.action: create a central government hostel at Centre Point for m.p's who have to stay in London overnight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: due to the recent apologies from all concerned mp's, over their indulgent expense anomolies, central government should take the initiative and lease as many floors of Centre Point, convert to one bed/bath rooms, and charge on a b&b basis direct so that no money changes hands.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
